alert.note: Alert for Grundy; Kendall; La Salle; Lee (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 04 at 8:22PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...Line of Showers with gusty winds will impact portions of Kendall, northern La Salle, eastern Lee, southern De Kalb, northern Grundy and southern Kane Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 821 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers and embeded thunderstorms along a line extending from Mendota to near Crest Hill. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Joliet, Plainfield, Oswego, Batavia, Ottawa, Yorkville, Morris, Channahon, Minooka, Plano, Peru, La Salle, Sandwich, Mendota, Coal City, Marseilles, Sheridan, Shabbona and Montgomery. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
